name: ERIE INSURANCE EXCHANGE v. Michael BRISTOL and RCC, Inc. Petition of: Michael Bristol

parties: ERIE INSURANCE EXCHANGE v. Michael BRISTOL and RCC, Inc. Petition of: Michael Bristol

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM
AND NOW, this 29th day of December, 2016, the Petition for Allowance of Appeal is GRANTED. The issue, rephrased for clarity, is:
In uninsured motorist claims subject to mandatory arbitration, is the statute of limitations tolled only by the commencement of an official judicial action, or may extrajudicial actions also toll the statute of limitations?
opinions.author: PER CURIAM

casebody.head_matter:
160 A.3d 123
ERIE INSURANCE EXCHANGE v. Michael BRISTOL and RCC, Inc. Petition of: Michael Bristol
No. 439 MAL 2016
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
December 29, 2016
